body:
You need to save inside `distribution.scope()`, so this should work:

```python
with distribution.scope():
    model.save_weights('my_weight.h5')
```

Also if you're then trying to load weights under the `MirroredStrategy`, I think it will only load onto the first tower (although maybe this is fixed?). Anyway you can look [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a6d8ffae097d0132989ae4688d224121ec6d8f35/tensorflow/python/keras/engine/distributed_training_utils.py#L31-L52) for an example of how to do it.
